lines: They are quite nice looking, how much for one?
Oh a customer! Well to be honest you're the first person to want any of my vases. So I'll give you this one I just made for FREE!
Really?! Wow thank you very much
Anytime now someone else will come here and BUY one of my vases
Being a wooly ram in sweltering conditions is no fun at all. Thank goodness the Blue team has tons of air-conditioning

found: Oh I'll be with you in one second I just need to...beat...this...level
Oh ah anyways, hello welcome to the Blue team, just relax, do whatever you want no obligations, nothing, you get it?
(Man this is like the 100th time I've lost on this level)
missing: Sorry playing a gam...I mean I'm busy right now, come back later

lines: (Nevermind, I don't think I should bother asking anything)
Yep Blue team was the right choice, only they have the most relaxing places to lounge...
